title: Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire (2018) PC|RePack[DRM Free]
description:
DESCRIPTION: 
Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire is a sequel to the Pillars of Eternity, which was released in 2015, deserving the location of players on the PC (and later the console gamer), as well as the highest ratings of critics. The game Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire was exhibited by developments of Obsidian Entertainment on the platformfinding platform Fig (analogue of Kickstarter) and collected 4 times more than originally planned - 4.7 million dollars. The sequel will include the beloved heroes from the original Pillars of Eternity, before which, however, new tasks are set - to defeat the mysteriously animated god Eotas, whose temple ruins were investigated in the first part. 

FEATURES: 
- Based on DRM Free version from gog.com 
- Do not cut / Do not recoded
- Game archives are not opened 
- Game version - 1.0.1.0064 
- Addition: Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire - Captain's Footlocker 
- Installation time 12 minutes on the HDD (Depends on the computer) 
»Repack from xatab

Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.50 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3 B73 
Memory: 4 GB 
Graphics Card: DirectX 11 Compatible 
Free space on hard disk : 38.9 GB
